title: Hailey Bieber serves opulence in luxurious satin pajamas as she steps out in LA
text:
Hailey Bieber may have been married to Justin for over a year, but she's still serving that new bride glow.

The couple recently returned from their second wedding, which took place last week in South Carolina.

The happy wife was spotted Sunday in Los Angeles, serving a luxurious chic look in satin pajamas.

PJ vibes: Hailey Bieber stepped out Sunday in West Hollywood, serving a luxurious chic look in satin pajamas

Hailey donned a satin cream button-down shirt with a pair of matching drawstring pants.

The 22-year-old accessorized with a pair of '90s style black oval sunglasses, wrapped in metallic gold.

It was paired with some matching thick gold hoop earrings and her gold chain necklace with the 'wifey' diamond plate.

She carried a leather ribbed Louis Vuitton belt bag across her chest, featuring gold accents.

Wifey: It was paired with some matching thick gold hoop earrings and her gold chain necklace with the 'wifey' diamond plate. She carried a leather ribbed Louis Vuitton belt bag across her chest, featuring gold accents

Cool kicks: She completed the look with a pair of plain white sneakers

Coffee run: The model was spotted making a coffee run in West Hollywood

She completed the look with a pair of plain white Adidas sneakers, as she stepped out for a coffee run in West Hollywood.

Earlier in the day, Hailey posted a snap to her Instagram story of herself and Justin in bed.

She also posted a cute video as she reminded Justin that 'Saturdays are for the boys, and Sundays are for the wife.'

Justin's mom Pattie Mallette recently took to Instagram to gush about her daughter-in-law.

Beautiful bride: She wrote in a comment: 'You have truly been blessed with a BEAUTIFUL bride, son. INSIDE AND OUT!'

Following last week's wedding, she wrote in a comment: 'You have truly been blessed with a BEAUTIFUL bride, son. INSIDE AND OUT!

'I don’t think I could have picked a better match for you. You are a gift to each other. I am grateful and consistently humbled by the love and blessings of God over you both. My mamas heart is full. Okay. Here we go again..'

The comment appeared under Justin's music video for his track 10,000 Hours, which he recorded with Dan + Shay.

He and Hailey appear in the video, putting on a romantic display in a bed surrounded by lush florals.

The video dropped last week, the same day the couple stripped down to their undies to appear in Calvin Klein's new campaign for the brand's 50th birthday.
description: Justin's mom Pattie Mallette recently took to Instagram to gush about her daughter-in-law after last week's wedding: 'You have truly been blessed with a BEAUTIFUL bride, son. INSIDE AND OUT!'
